references: Related: CF 956988. Repealing: Ord 93669, Ord 93670, Ord 93761, Ord 93672.
summary: AN ORDINANCE abandoning the improvement of North and Northwest 127th Street from Dayton Avenue North to 12th Avenue Northwest and certain other streets by paving and otherwise improving the same under Ordinance 93669, repealing said ordinance and Ordinances 93670, 93671 and 93672.
